summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1392, for the improvement of Boren Avenue North in the City of Seattle from Denny Way to Mercer Street, by grading and curbing the same under Ordinance No. 15250 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
